channel.title: Kowainik Blog
channel.description: We are writing about what we find fascinating or exciting. Our blog's aim is to share our knowledge about functional programming, distribute best-practices based on our extensive experience and tell about various topics from beginner-friendly introductions to advanced type-level tricks.

item.title: Arrows Zoo
item.description: The digest of all arrows (->, <-, =>, etc.) use cases in Haskell.
item.dc:creator: Kowainik

item.title: Totality
item.description: A comprehensive guide to the concept of totality in Functional Programming.
item.dc:creator: Kowainik

item.title: Foo to Bar: Naming Conventions in Haskell
item.description: A comprehensive guide for various naming conventions for types, variables and functions in Haskell
item.dc:creator: Kowainik

item.title: Haskell Documentation with Haddock: Wishes'n'Tips
item.description: A comprehensive guide for documentation with Haddock in Haskell
item.dc:creator: Kowainik

item.title: Brave New Hacktoberfest — Learn4Haskell
item.description: Results of the Hacktoberfest 2020 in Kowainik
item.dc:creator: Kowainik

item.title: Strategic Deriving
item.description: A comprehensive guide for deriving in Haskell
item.dc:creator: Kowainik

item.title: Haskell mini-patterns handbook
item.description: Collection of small Haskell patterns with detailed description, examples and exercises
item.dc:creator: Kowainik

item.title: Policeman in da Bristol city
item.description: Bristol Haskell Hackathon 2020 project — Policeman — a tool for Haskell PVP version suggesting.
item.dc:creator: Kowainik

item.title: GSoC 2019 for mentors: Summertime Codeness
item.description: Our Google Summer of Code journey as mentors for Issue Wanted project
item.dc:creator: Kowainik
